title: Just Shred
description: A Steamy Snowboard Romance Just ShredI was never meant to come backI lost everything on this mountainMy best friend, my family, and a part of my heartBut it takes a bad boy snowboarder to glue the broken pieces back togetherJesse is everything I don’t want, but maybe he’s the one I needLines get shredded until there is nothing left to run away fromOnly himI once left my heart on a mountainNow I’m afraid I’m doing it all over againOne thing I know for sureI'm in for a wild ride
author: L.A. Wayward
